channel.title: Removing Server IP & Port from Client
channel.description:
I'd like to remove the server IP & port from my client. I've tried various different things, including removing the whole server IP & port statement, but I just get some errors which mindfuck me.
[IMG]http://uploadir.com/u/0b27a6da[/img]
Any help. It's Galkon's base btw.
